meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in many proteins.
meanings.sent1: Tryptophanes are important building blocks for our body.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the different types of amino acids, including tryptophanes.
meanings.sent3: The tryptophanes at the protein party were the life of the amino acid dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her love for tryptophanes was as strong as the bonds they form in proteins.
meanings.sent5: The tryptophanes glowed like stars in the vast universe of amino acids.

meanings.sent1: The lab assistant labeled the jars with different amino acids, including tryptophanes.
meanings.sent2: Tryptophanes are essential components of our diet.
meanings.sent3: The tryptophanes in the container looked like a colorful mix of alphabet soup.
meanings.sent4: In the world of amino acids, tryptophanes stood out like a group of friends in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The chef added a sprinkle of tryptophanes to the dish, enhancing its nutritional value.
